Description:
Detects an office application (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)  that initiate a network connection to a non-private IP addresses.
This rule aims to detect traffic similar to one seen exploited in CVE-2021-42292.
This rule will require an initial baseline and tuning that is specific to your organization.


Author: Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock', SCYTHE '@scythe_io', Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Tim Shelton, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Office Application Initiated Network Connection To Non-Local IP
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\excel.exe' or process_path like '%\outlook.exe' or process_path like '%\powerpnt.exe' or process_path like '%\winword.exe' or process_path like '%\wordview.exe') and initiated = 'true') and  not ((dst_ip cidr '127.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '10.0.0.0/8' or dst_ip cidr '172.16.0.0/12' or dst_ip cidr '192.168.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '169.254.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '::1/128' or dst_ip cidr 'fe80::/10' or dst_ip cidr 'fc00::/7') or (dst_ip cidr '20.184.0.0/13' or dst_ip cidr '20.192.0.0/10' or dst_ip cidr '23.72.0.0/13' or dst_ip cidr '40.76.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '51.10.0.0/15' or dst_ip cidr '51.103.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '51.104.0.0/15' or dst_ip cidr '51.142.136.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '52.160.0.0/11' or dst_ip cidr '204.79.197.0/24') or ((dst_ip cidr '13.107.6.152/31' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.18.10/31' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.128.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '23.103.160.0/20' or dst_ip cidr '40.96.0.0/13' or dst_ip cidr '40.104.0.0/15' or dst_ip cidr '52.96.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '131.253.33.215/32' or dst_ip cidr '132.245.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '150.171.32.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '204.79.197.215/32' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1006::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1016::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1026::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1036::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1046::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1056::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:4::152/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:4::153/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:c::10/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:c::11/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:d::10/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:d::11/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:8f0::/46' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:900::/46' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:a92::152/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:a92::153/128') and (dst_port = '80' or dst_port = '443')) or ((dst_ip cidr '40.92.0.0/15' or dst_ip cidr '40.107.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '52.100.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '52.238.78.88/32' or dst_ip cidr '104.47.0.0/17' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f400::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f403::/48') and dst_port = '25') or ((dst_ip cidr '20.20.32.0/19' or dst_ip cidr '20.190.128.0/18' or dst_ip cidr '20.231.128.0/19' or dst_ip cidr '40.126.0.0/18' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1006:2000::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1007:200::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1016:1400::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1017::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1026:3000::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1027:1::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1036:3000::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1037:1::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1046:2000::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1047:1::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1056:2000::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1057:2::/48') and (dst_port = '80' or dst_port = '443') and protocol = 'tcp') or ((dst_ip cidr '13.107.6.192/32' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.9.192/32' or dst_ip cidr '52.108.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:4::192/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:a92::192/128') and dst_port = '443' and protocol = 'tcp') or ((dst_ip cidr '13.107.6.152/31' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.18.10/31' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.128.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '23.103.160.0/20' or dst_ip cidr '40.96.0.0/13' or dst_ip cidr '40.104.0.0/15' or dst_ip cidr '52.96.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '131.253.33.215/32' or dst_ip cidr '132.245.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '150.171.32.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '204.79.197.215/32' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1006::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1016::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1026::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1036::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1046::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1056::/36' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:4::152/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:4::153/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:c::10/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:c::11/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:d::10/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:d::11/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:8f0::/46' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:900::/46' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:a92::152/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:a92::153/128') and (dst_port = '143' or dst_port = '587' or dst_port = '993' or dst_port = '995') and protocol = 'tcp') or ((dst_ip cidr '40.92.0.0/15' or dst_ip cidr '40.107.0.0/16' or dst_ip cidr '52.100.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '52.238.78.88/32' or dst_ip cidr '104.47.0.0/17' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f400::/48' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f403::/48') and dst_port = '443') or ((dst_ip cidr '13.107.136.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '40.108.128.0/17' or dst_ip cidr '52.104.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '104.146.128.0/17' or dst_ip cidr '150.171.40.0/22' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1061:1300::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:8f8::/46' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:908::/46' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f402::/48') and (dst_port = '80' or dst_port = '443') and protocol = 'tcp') or ((dst_ip cidr '13.107.6.171/32' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.18.15/32' or dst_ip cidr '13.107.140.6/32' or dst_ip cidr '52.108.0.0/14' or dst_ip cidr '52.244.37.168/32' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1006:1400::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1016:2400::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1026:2400::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1036:2400::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1046:1400::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1056:1400::/40' or dst_ip cidr '2603:1063:2000::/38' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:c::15/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:8fc::6/128' or dst_ip cidr '2620:1ec:a92::171/128' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f100:2000::a83e:3019/128' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f100:2002::8975:2d79/128' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f100:2002::8975:2da8/128' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f100:7000::6fdd:6cd5/128' or dst_ip cidr '2a01:111:f100:a004::bfeb:88cf/128') and (dst_port = '80' or dst_port = '443') and protocol = 'tcp')))
